div.div: Overview of the available peptide-capping schemes available in FragBuilder.
div.p: All three examples show an alanine residue (shown between a set of gray lines). In (A), the caps are the N- and C-termini in their charged states. In (B) the caps are the N- and C-termini in their neutral states. In (C) the caps are methyl groups. Caps can be mixed and matched according to the userâ€™s specifications.
